product_name: Bison Designs Xtream Survival Pod Keychain
long_description: Unbraid the Xtream Survival Pod Keychain from Bison Designs to utilize 16 survival tools, such as 12 ft. of paracord, a knife, firestick flint and tinder, fishing hooks, hacksaw and more. Just 4 in. long, the Xstream Survival Pod holds your keys and might just save your life someday. Unbraid the pod to obtain 12 ft. of strong 550 lb. paracord; carabiner clips the pod to a zipper pull, pack, etc. Inside are wrapped the following: sharp eye knife; 1 in. firestick flint; 6 in. jute firestarter/tinder; 6 in. strip of duct tape; 1-1/4-in. sewing needle. Also, a spoon lure; #6 and #8 live bait fishing hooks; tin split-shot removable fishing weights; 15 ft. monofiliment fishing line. And, 12 in. of green steel snare wire; 1-1/2-in. hacksaw blade; 1 gram of reusable hot glue. Bison Designs donates a portion of the proceeds from this paracord product to organizations which provide support to wounded veterans.
short_description: Unbraid the Xtream Survival Pod Keychain from Bison Designs to utilize 16 survival tools, such as 12 ft. of paracord, a knife, firestick flint and tinder, fishing hooks, hacksaw and more.
